title: Exciting IPO Lineup Ahead? Join the Action With These ETFs
title_zh: 令人兴奋的 IPO 阵容即将到来？与这些 ETF 一起行动
summary: With blockbuster IPOs lining up, ETFs provide a low-stress way to play the trend.
summary_zh: 随着大规模 IPO 的不断涌现，ETF 提供了一种轻松应对趋势的方式。

title: Will 2026 Be a Year for Massive IPOs?
summary: Will 2026 unleash mega IPOs? SpaceX, OpenAI & Anthropic loom large as IPO window reopens. Investors may eye IPO, FPX ETFs for exposure.
summary_zh: 2026 年会出现大型 IPO 吗？随着 IPO 窗口重新开启，SpaceX、OpenAI 和 Anthropic 的影响力日益凸显。投资者可能会关注 IPO、FPX ETF 进行投资。

title: The IPO Market Is Poised to Reopen. Canva, Kraken, Databricks Could Be on Deck.
title_zh: IPO市场即将重新开放。 Canva、Kraken、Databricks 都可以使用。
summary: Avery Marquez, IPO specialist at Renaissance Capital, offers advice for investors as the market for initial public offerings heats up again.
summary_zh: 随着首次公开募股市场再次升温，Renaissance Capital IPO 专家艾弗里·马尔克斯 (Avery Marquez) 为投资者提供建议。

title: IPO Market Rebounds In Q3; These Small IPOs More Than Double
title_zh: 第三季度IPO市场反弹；这些小型 IPO 数量增加了一倍多
summary: After a slowdown in the second quarter, the IPO market is back in full stride in the third quarter, with the most initial public offerings and the most $100-million deals since 2021.  "IPOs delayed by earlier macro headwinds were revived or even accelerated to take advantage of surging demand for new issues, resulting in a steady pickup through July, a more-active-than-usual August, and more robust deal flow in September," Renaissance Capital said in a report.  The 60 IPOs launched so far in the third quarter raised a combined $14.6 billion — way up from a quiet year-ago period that saw only $2.4 billion raised.
summary_zh: 经过第二季度的放缓后，IPO市场在第三季度全面恢复，出现了自2021年以来最多的首次公开募股和最多的1亿美元交易。Renaissance Capital在一份报告中表示，“由于早期宏观逆风而推迟的IPO得以复苏，甚至加速，以利用新股需求激增的机会，导致7月份稳步回升，8月份比平常更加活跃，9月份的交易流更加强劲。”  第三季度迄今推出的 60 起 IPO 筹集资金总额达 146 亿美元，远高于去年同期仅筹集 24 亿美元的平静时期。

title: U.S. IPO Market Rebounding Fast: ETFs Likely to Gain
title_zh: 美国IPO市场快速反弹：ETF有望上涨
summary: IPO activity is rebounding in 2025. Chances of easier Fed policy, a strong stock market, receding trade tensions and AI boom fuel momentum.
summary_zh: IPO 活动将在 2025 年反弹。美联储政策宽松、股市强劲、贸易紧张局势缓和以及人工智能繁荣可能会推动势头。
